execute-sql.sql: select * from ( select SN, NAME, BRAND, PRICE, MATERIA, COLOR, SPEC_NAME, SPEC_SIZE, PARAMETER, GROSS_WEIGHT, CATEGORY_NAME, STYLE, MODEL_NAME, MODEL_FILE_SN, DESIGN, IS_WITH_CORE, FILLER, STATUS, SHELVES_TIME, ADDER_SN, ADDER_NAME, ADD_TIME, UPDATER_SN, UPDATER_NAME, UPDATE_TIME, TYPE from fnt_product ) a where 1=1
